overview: Everyone always expects twinks to be only interested in vanilla sex, but as you’ll quickly discover from this kinky little number that isn’t always the case at all. In fact, the twink mind can be even more twisted than its older variant; as soon becomes apparent when the likes of Sean Spicer and Mickey Taylor are brought together to explore each other in somewhat less than conventional ways. No sweetness and light for these lads. No, they’re more into nipple clamps and bondage, as these horny couplings take a turn for the dark and pleasurable side time after time. If you like “nice” sex then this probably won’t be for you. Fans of action with a little more bite, however, can expect a ruthless unloading of their balls time and again!
title: Obedient & Tormented Twinks
